content: I'm thinking of upgrading my brake pads and rotors to improve my car's stopping power, especially since I've been doing some track days and auto racing events. I took my car to a local mechanic a few months ago to get it tuned, and the results were amazing - my car gained an extra 20 horsepower, which made a huge difference in its acceleration. I'm wondering if there are any specific brake pad and rotor setups that you would recommend for track driving and auto racing.
